summary: Email from Rebecca Russo, a senior paralegal and real estate processor, regarding the closing documents for a property transaction involving 'Granite Reality'. The email includes attachments of deeds, seller documents, and post-closing checks and disbursements, and is addressed to Kayla Grimme and Kate Halsted.

events.title: Granite Reality Property Closing
events.description: Real estate transaction closing for a property referred to as 'Granite Reality', involving the sending of deed, seller documents, and post-closing financial documents.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 12, 2019, concerning the closing of a real estate transaction named 'Granite Reality'.
Rebecca Russo, a senior paralegal and real estate processor, is the sender and is assistant to Kristen Sinnott.
The email includes multiple attachments: a deed, seller documents, and post-closing check and disbursement documents.
The transaction appears to be seller-side/brokers only, with original buyer documents located in New London.
The email contains a standard legal confidentiality disclaimer, indicating it is from a law firm or legal services provider.
